features: 🎇 Android 11 OS; 3GB RAM + 128GB ROM Micro SD up to 128GB; 12nm process; 800MHz GPU; 2.0GHz
🎇 Ultra-Large 6.52-inch Waterdrop Screen with 20:9 aspect ratio; 5500mAh with OTG function

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Impress Everyone, with your Stylish Phone 6.52-inch Waterdrop Screen, Be Immersed When pursuing the best image size and comfortable grip feel, Note 10P with 20:9 aspect ratio is quite confident.This is Art in the Palm of Your Hand 128GB Storage Save More Everything The Note 10P runs at a 3GB of RAM for fast and efficient performance for the task at hand, enjoy a 128GB of internal storage and add up to 128GB more with MicroSD card.Do Whatever You Like

2 Day Use on Only 1 Charge The high capacity of 5500mAh makes Note 10 run for hours, no matter you watching videos or playing games. Supports 10W fast charging. 13MP Triple Rear AI Camera The 13MP main rear camera works in conjunction with a 2MP macro lens and a depth sensor, so you can capture stunning images with splendid colors and details. Front Camera, Capture Your Beauty The 8MP front-facing camera shows off its ability to snap the best of you all the time, and with the assistance of clever photo filters, your social media selfies that put in your best face can be easily captured with just a simple shoot. 4G Dual SIM Dual Standby Ulefone Note 10P Does NOT work with AT&T OR Cricket OR CDMA Carriers such as Verizon, Sprint, Boost Mobile, Straight Talk or U.S.Cellular! It CAN work with GSM Carriers like T-Mobile, Metro PCS and Others! Please Confirm Your SIM Card's frequency bands are included in Supported Bands Before Order! Android 11. Faster and Safer Manage your conversations in the same spot. Get all your messages in one place, see, respond to and control your conversations across multiple messaging apps. Bubbles keep the conversation going—while you stay focused on whatever else you’re doing. You can pin conversations so they always appear on top of other apps and screens. Built-in screen recording. Screen recording lets you capture what’s happening on your phone.

Two Ways to Unlock Your Device Face recognition and fingerprint reader both can help you quick access your phone. 3D Color Gradient Design Inspired by the refraction of light, Ulefone Note 10 uses a 3D color gradient design on its back cover. It has a dynamic prism-shaped color gradient at the back, shining whenever it moves. And the matte texture makes it anti-fingerprints.

System Android 11 Processor Unisoc Tiger T310 Storage 3GB RAM + 128GB ROM Storage (support 128GB TF card) Display 6.52 inch HD+ Waterdrop Screen (diagonal) Battery 5500mAh Large Battery (built in), supports 10W fast charging Network 4G Dual SIM Dual Standby Camera 8MP + 2MP + 2MP Three Rear Camera + 8MP Front Camera Others WiFi, Bluetooth, FM, 3.5mm audio jack, GPS, VoLTE, Cell Broadcast Supports Many APPs Whats App, Snapchat, Instagram, Facebook, Twitter, YouTube, Prime Video, BBC iPlayer, and so on. Fingerprint Reader YES Face Recognition YES OTG YES Language support Indonesian, Malay, Catalan, Czech, Danish, German, Estonian, English, Spanish, Filipino, French, Croatian, Italian, Latvian, Lithuanian, Hungarian, Dutch, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese, Romanian, Slovak, Finnish, Swedish, Vietnamese, Greek, Turkish, Bulgarian, Russian, Serb, Ukrainian, Armenian, Hebrew, Urdu, Arabic, Persian, Hindi, Bengali, Thai, Korean, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese Size and Weight H: 6.5 inch, W: 3.0 inch, D: 0.38 inch | Weight: 203 grams In the Box 1* Ulefone Note 10P, 1x AC Power Charger Adapter(UK plug), 1x USB-A to Micro USB Charger Cable (1M), 1x Protective Film(Pre-installed), 1x Protective Case, 1x SIM Needle, 1x Multiple Languages, 1x Charging Instruction Card, 1x Safety Prompt Card

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 14, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Absolutely worth the money and highly recommend
reviews.reviewText: The phone is awesome and it’s at an unbelievable price! Fast reliable and looks sharp! Came with a case and a screen protector already installed.Everything loads fast on this phone so no more waiting for an app to open. The face detect and fingerprint sensor work very well too and I've had no problems unlocking my phone with them.Call quality is great. You can hear the person on the other line clearly and they can hear you. Camera is awesome, battery life is great.Overall this is a great phone for the price and highly recommended

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 7, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great phone for great price
reviews.reviewText: Just received. Positively surprised the phone came inside soft rubber protective case and screen protector already applied. Factory or seller retained original factory screen cover with labels and features listed ready to peel off. No need to spend extra money. I've been worrying where to get these from. Phone came with North American charger, USB-C cable and USB to mini jack adapter included, . Better not to lose it, haha.Works perfectly fine on Cricket (data and voice) which is owned by AT&T. I even called customer service to inquiry about the phone, gave them the IMEI and they said "The phone is compatible" and registered to their network.In 3 hours it used 1% of battery in idle with WiFi on.The only issue I noticed it does not connect to hidden WiFi hotspots at some places and typing all the info given does not work. Probably it needs the hotspot visible for just one time. It could be hidden again and the phone should remember it. Not the first device I encountered this. Amcrest IP cameras had the same problem.Will update after some time, but at this moment would definitely recommend.UPDATE 08/12/2019After few days of use taking one star off for camera quality.Pros:+ Battery life great. All day with data on and lightweight use takes up to 15-20%. Wifi only uses even less battery than LTE data.+ Support most of USA LTE bands (the most I ever seen in budget Chinese brand)+ Pretty fast relative speed (no noticable lag except when launching/dismissing camera app especially from locked screen or unlocking with camera in foreground is slow)+ Free memory after loading bunch of apps is still around 2.0 GB and after deep cleaning from the OS is 2.6 GB.Cons:- Earpiece not loud enough. Wish that could be improved.- Can't connect to hidden WiFi hotspot.- Camera is mediocre. Takes nice pictures under ideal conditions (outside in day light, inside or evening you better don't move)- No zoom. Not even digital. Perhaps I am dumb and don't know how to engage it. At least sliding fingers across frame did not help.- No OIS (optical stabilization)- Captured movies are terrible. It can't retain focus. Loses focus every few seconds or won't get it at all. Technically you are able to lock the focus, but after camera had acquired good focus the circular marker disappears and you need to touch and hold it again, but it will get into focusing again screwing the previous.Except the camera all the functions run smoothly as for the phone. It's still good phone.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 17, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The phone is very good !
reviews.reviewText: I want a phone with 1. It has dual sim cards so I can use for travelling in different countries ( including China) . 2. It is not expensive and with good performance. There are many phones made by China meet my requirements. But after I bought and compared several phones, I think this one is the best. I tried to put one T-Mobile card and one Verizon card in it and it is working perfectly. It is only $200 but the all function performance are very good ( speaker, photo, Wi-Fi , display,audio and video , Android app , etc.). I have iPhone X and iPhone X Max also but now I use this phone for most of the time.And one more thing is important that the company technic support is very good. I had many questions to ask them and got feedback quickly. The people are nice and patient. Their technical knowledge is good to answer my questions.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Not what I expected
reviews.reviewText: I got tired carrying two (2) phones, so I purchased the phone for the dual sim capability. Phone reception and sound quality is horrible, incoming and outgoing. Press the send button and wait upto 60 seconds before call begins. Of course, no warranty. Also call hand off between towers is non existing. Constantly dropping calls regardless of signal bars being three or more. Data performance I guess is ok but I primary use for calls and texting.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 18, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great phone for the price.
reviews.reviewText: So far I'm loving this phone. I was nervous to by a brand I had not heard of but the price for what this offers was too good to pass up and I refuse to pay ridiculous money for a phone! so far I am very pleased. The phone is very impressive right out of the box. Much thinner than I expected with such a large battery life and it came with a case and screen protector already on it. I did have to buy a nano SIM for straight talk but it was like $4 on Amazon so not a big deal. I've loaded and tested all my favorite apps and everything works great. The display is beautiful, sounds are good, phone call sound quality is great, and my Fitbit works well with it. The only thing I haven't really tested too much so far is the camera. I snapped a few pics just to make sure it worked but as far as the quality of the camera I can't say just yet. However, I am very pleased with the phone overall and may even buy one for my husband.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 11, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars DOES NOT HAVE LTE SOFTWARE!!!
reviews.reviewText: Phone arrived right away. Was a beautiful color and awesome screen display and I was super psyched to have it. UNTIL, I tried to set it up. There's where I had the issues. Where ultimately after 2hrs on phone with tech from provider, I discovered that this phone wouldn't fully connect to my service because it's 4g, yes. But theres zero LTE whatever, which any decent, new phone that has all the other features this one does, SHOULD HAVE!! So, sadly I returned mine. Wish it was what they say it is but it's not. Probably won't work with any service not from Stone age. Sucked. Total tease 4 real.

Ulefone è attualmente una marca ignota, ma se continua a lavorare in questo modo si farà conoscere ben presto. Sono più di due mesi che lo utilizzo e ne sono rimasto soddisfattissimo. Bello da vedere, schermo grande, tutto funziona come dovrebbe, veloce e reattivo, non entra in difficoltà neanche con i giochi più impegnativi, la carica dura a lungo e la ricarica è piuttosto breve. Ottima la ricezione del segnale, più che buono l'audio, forte e nitido. Se volessi cercare il pelo nell'uovo parlerei di una fotocamera non eccellente, unico dettaglio che mi ha parzialmente deluso, funzione che comunque non m'interessa più di tanto. Il rapporto qualità prezzo è davvero buono, se paragonassimo questo prodotto a smartphone di marche più blasonate ma con caratteristiche equivalenti, scopriremmo che andremmo a spendere quasi il doppio. Attualmente mi sento di consigliarlo ad occhi chiusi.

reviews.reviewTitle: Calidad precio excepcional. Muy buen móvil.
reviews.reviewText: Me ha encantado este móvil, la verdad que me ha sorprendido, no tiene nada que envidiarle a otros de mayor precio, lo he cogido con una oferta de navidad así que calidad precio excepcional, muy buenas funcionalidad, carga las páginas rápido y de momento no se apaga mi hace cosas raras por lo que estoy muy satisfecho.

Buon telefono, funziona molto bene. Semplice e Android. Misura nella media, non particolarmente pesante. Ha la lettura delle impronte digitali. Buon volume delle suonerie, per il prezzo di costo direi decisamente un buon telefono. Non ha la possibilità del doppio tocco per sbloccarlo, purtroppo, né lo sblocco con riconoscimento del viso.

Confezione perfetta ,arrivato prima del previsto. All'interno della confezione ci sono cover e due pellicole in omaggio.acquistato per mia figlia un po scettica per la marca sconosciuta ma non appena lo ha acceso ed ha cominciato ad usarlo ne è rimasta entusiasta!!!!!!!Cellulare molto reattivo senza alcun bug. La connettività è buona e la batteria con uso intenso le permette di arrivare a sera con ca il 20 %di caricaConsigliatissimo!!!!

Je utilise constamment tous les jours .La mémoire et au top .La vitesse des applications et encore au top .plus de ralentissement comme sur mon ancien Samsung.J'ai voulus essayer de reprendre a essais mon ancien Samsung lol ..j'ai repris ce téléphone une heure après ..Livrer avec Android 10 mais et passer en Android 11 avec les mises à jour.Question niveau caméra avec ses 3 caméra la qualité et excellente.Seul petit hic que je pourrais dire et le sons sur haut parleur qui n'est pas assez fort pour mon avis personnel.Qualité écran très bon .Donc en gros je recommande a 100% et question pour prix pour la qualité rien a redire
